p.span: The Academy of Accelerated Learning is closely monitoring the Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19), and is in contact with the Centers for Disease Control, Texas Department of State Health Services and Houston Health Department of State, the Houston Health Department, and the Texas Education Agency to ensure all students and staff memebrs are safe and updated with the latest information.

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });
$(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

div.h1: SCHOOL CLOSURE UPDATES - AS OF APRIL 17, 2020

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

p.span: School will remained closed through May 27, 2020 as directed by Texas Governor Abbott. AAL will continue to provide food service for families, Monday-Friday from10:00am- 1:00pm at each campus. Additionally, virtual learning resources are available online atwww.aalinc.orgunderEducation Resources.Please complete the Technology Survey underCoronavirus. Thank you.

Laescuelapermanecercerradahasta el 27 de Mayo del 2020segnlasindicacionesdelGobernadorde Texas Abbott. AALcontinuarbrindandoserviciode comida parafamiliasde Lunes a Viernes de 10am 1:00pm.Adems, los recursos de aprendizaje virtual estn en lnea enwww.aalinc.orgenRecursos Educativos. Por favor complete la Encuesta de Tecnologa bajoCoronavirus. Gracias.

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });
$(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

div.h1: INSTRUCTIONAL PACKAGES / LOS PAQUETES DE INSTRUCCIN

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

p.span: AAL will provide instructional packages Monday, April 13, 2020 through May 1, 2020 during the delivery of Breakfast and Lunch from 10:00am - 1:00pm at each campus. Additionally, virtual learning resources are available online at www.aalinc.org under Education Resources.Please complete the Technology Survey under Coronavirus.

Los paquetes de instruccin de AAL se entregarn desde el Lunes 13 de Abril del 2020 al 1 de Mayo durante la entrega del Desayuno y el Almuerzo de 10:00 am a 1:00 pm en cada escuela. Adems, los recursos de aprendizaje virtual estn en lnea en www.aalinc.org en Recursos Educativos. Por favor complete la Encuesta de Tecnologa bajo Coronavirus.

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });
$(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

div.h1: BREAKFAST AND LUNCH SERVICE / SERVICIO DE DESAYUNO Y ALMUERZO

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

p.span: The Academy of Accelerated Learning, Inc. will begin serving Breakfast and Lunch Monday through Friday, starting March 23, 2020 through May 27, 2020 from 10:00am through 1:00pm. at the Chimney Rock and Bellfort campuses.
AAL will be using a "Grab & Go" system and students can pick up both meals from service carts near the back cafeteria door at each campus.

La escuela de Academy of Accelerated Learning, Inc. servir Desayuno y Almuerzo de Lunes a Viernes, a partir del 23 de Marzo del 2020 hasta el 27 deMayo del 2020 de 10:00 am a 1:00 pm.en nuestras dos escuelas de Chimney Rock y Bellfort.

AAL utilizar un sistema de solo "Recoger los alimentos" (Grab & Go) y as los estudiantes podrn tomar ambas comidas de los carros de servicio ubicados en la puerta trasera de la cafeteria en cada escuela.

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });
$(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });
$(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

p.span: In response to recent school closures we are gathering information about the ability of our students to continue learning at home using online materials and/or a virtual classroom. Please complete the following survey to help us understand the availability of internet and devices in your home. This will allow us to determine what supports we can provide our students to support continued learning at home. The survey can be accessed here:
If possible, please complete it by Thursday, April 24, 2020.

br.span: En respuesta a los cierres recientes de escuelas, estamos recopilando informacin sobre la capacidad de nuestros estudiantes para continuar aprendiendo en casa usando materiales en lnea y/o una aula virtual. Complete la siguiente encuesta para ayudarnos a comprender la disponibilidad de Internet y dispositivos en su hogar. Esto nos permitir determinar qu apoyo podemos brindar a nuestros estudiantes para apoyar el aprendizaje continuo en casa. Se puede acceder a la encuesta aqu.

span.a: Encuesta de Acceso a la Tecnologa - Espaol

p.span: Si es posible, por favor complete antes delviernes24 de Abril del 2020.
